thread.title: Extreme phone pinching is the newest 'travel trend'
thread.title_full: Extreme phone pinching is the newest 'travel trend'

title: Extreme phone pinching is the newest 'travel trend'
text:
Extreme phone pinching is the newest 'travel trend' Last updated 09:50, October 14 2015 oconnor_m/Instagram 
Phone-pinching is the internet's newest crazy. 
The internet has a new travel trend, and it is probably the worst one we've ever seen. 
It's called 'phone-pinching' and involves holding your expensive smartphone over a canyon, cliff or some other perilous place using only your thumb and forefinger. 
The 'game' was given life in 2015 by American indie band Twenty One Pilots , who seem to have absolutely no regard for how much iPhones cost the general public. Oct 10, 2015 at 3:27pm PDT 
pinque_scrapbookingThe new "thing" over Niagara Falls on the Rainbow Bridge
